dict.string: Checks for the presence of the new admin account and then removes the retired one.

#!/bin/bash old_account="administrator" new_account="newadmin" /usr/bin/dscl . -read /Users/$new_account UniqueID 2> /dev/null if [[ $? -eq '0' ]]; then /usr/bin/dscl . -read /Users/$old_account UniqueID 2> /dev/null if [[ $? -eq '0' ]]; then exit 0 else exit 1 fi else exit 1 fi

#!/bin/bash old_account="administrator" new_account="newadmin" ard_group_name="com.apple.local.ard_admin" kickstart="/System/Library/CoreServices/RemoteManagement/ARDAgent.app/Contents/Resources/kickstart" /usr/bin/dscl . -delete /Users/$old_account if [[ -d /Users/$old_account ]]; then /bin/mv -f /Users/$old_account /var/$old_account fi if [[ -d /var/$old_account ]]; then /usr/sbin/chown -R $new_account:admin /var/$old_account fi /usr/sbin/dseditgroup -o edit -n /Local/Default -a $new_account -t user "$ard_group_name" /usr/sbin/dseditgroup -o edit -n /Local/Default -d $old_account -t user "$ard_group_name" $ard_kickstart -restart -quiet exit 0
